ConfigurationOption.Value: select s.assetnum, s.itemnum, i.description itemdescription, s.quantity, s.description, a.description, s.siteid, s.sparepartid, a.assetuid from sparepart s left join item i on s.itemnum = i.itemnum left join asset a on s.assetnum = a.assetnum and s.siteid = a.siteid

List.ListEntry: s.itemnum in (select itemnum from inventory where storeloc = '${MX_CURRENT_STOREROOM}')
a.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' ) and a.status in ('ACTIVE', 'OPERATING')

s.assetnum in (select assetnum from workorder where(wonum in ( select refwo from lbl_labtrans where lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' ) and status in ( select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG'))))
